function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Failure to integrate sustainability into covid-19 risk reduction measures","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Win-lose relationship between health and the economy due to social confinement","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Correlation between environmental impacts and economic activity","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 risk control measures and environmental impacts","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Building solutions not directly reducing transmission of sars-cov-2 or other viruses","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Adverse effects of the covid-19 outbreak on the environment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of access to outdoor spaces for residents in buildings","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and sunlight in enclosed balconies","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of natural green spaces and amenities in the building’s surrounding environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Contamination due to inefficient waste collection systems","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Accumulation of viruses in buildings due to carpets and rugs","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate building entrances contributing to pathogen transfer","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of isolation facilities for infected residents in housing buildings","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of investment for virus and infectious disease detection systems","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disruption of energy supply during a pandemic","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of touch-free technologies and digital controls in information systems","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate waste management contributing to viral transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Cross-contamination risk due to inadequate hvac systems","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact on energy consumption and investment costs","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential limitations of proposed solutions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate wastewater management and monitoring leading to the spread of infectious diseases through faecal-oral transmission, such as covid-19.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation systems in closed buildings, leading to poor air circulation and increased transmission of infectious diseases.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of expensive materials such as copper","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reduction in capacity of services due to social distancing measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on the continuation of the risk of transmission for social distancing measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential challenge to privacy due to software applications for risk identification","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Viral activity inside buildings posing a risk of disease transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of natural light and ventilation in buildings impacting public health","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of social distancing in public transport","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient green areas in urban zones","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of implementation of social distancing measures in urban areas","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective selection of materials and ventilation systems in buildings","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Complexity of adopting potential solutions for long-term disease mitigation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for airborne transmission of infectious diseases in enclosed spaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Temporary measures during pandemics leading to long-term changes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rubbish bags as potential vectors of disease transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Incineration emitting polluting gases","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reduced activity leading to less waste in landfills but also reducing recycling","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on unreliable energy supply","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Influence of natural light on virus activity","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Influence of wastewater and waste collection systems on virus transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of interior finishes on virus transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases in the built environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of differentiation between entrance and exit doors","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of safety distance markers in waiting areas and stops","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reduction of road width for wider pedestrian paths","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Distribution of public disinfectant containers or washing infrastructures","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"New pop-up service points for bicycle repairs and free water","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High population densities in urban areas","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased interaction between people due to urban design","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"}]}
